title: Raceonsucced
author: Raceonsucced
content: I always dreamed of having my own piano. therefore, sometimes I play the piano in an app. I feel happy even though it's only an application. but still I pray that one day I can buy my own piano.And what instrument do you always play?

comments.author: Kaliandra
comments.body: I always play the guitar every day, and the guitar that I have is an old guitar, but the sound is still pretty good, and every time I relax I always play it, to entertain myself.hopefully your goals are achieved.

comments.author: Tallupooh
comments.body: Quote from: Kaliandra on January 17, 2023, 02:38:54 AMI always play the guitar every day, and the guitar that I have is an old guitar, but the sound is still pretty good, and every time I relax I always play it, to entertain myself.hopefully your goals are achieved.I used to learn to play the guitar a lot, but now I don't anymore. I wish I could play it again, even now I've forgotten how the guitar chords.

comments.author: geeyow
comments.body: Guitar and drums. Influenced by my father who's a long-time part of a local rock band. I wanted to learn piano but I could never understand it, I get dizzy looking at those black and white keys.

comments.author: BobToo
comments.body: Definitely a guitar, I play it in my spare time

comments.author: mich
comments.body: I only play one musical instrument and that is the piano as a hobby, which I would not consider calling myself a pianist, not a professional one at least. There is nothing more enjoyable than playing as it does help my mind be at ease. Like when I am having a bad day or even when in a happy mood surely boosting my energy. The soothing sounds of the keys hitting  the strings, electrifying through your veins, hits the soul. It is so electrifying through the different piano music genres, like classical music, jazz, contemporary classics, or even piano rock.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: I have full respect for anybody who can play an instrument. I trialed for trumpet playing when I was at school but I wasn’t good enough & didn’t get selected for the class. After that I didn’t ever try again, I’d love to play guitar but I feel too old maybe.I don’t even know how to read music if I’m honest. That’s something that needs to be taught & again, maybe too late for me. If you have the gift to play an instrument well, don’t give up on it. Keep on playing that sweet music.

comments.author: Qiubell5
comments.body: I'm not very good at playing musical instruments, but sometimes I learn from my brother how to play the guitar. although a bit stiff, but this is quite fun.

comments.author: Cgrexp
comments.body: Quote from: Raceonsucced on January 17, 2023, 02:27:31 AMI always dreamed of having my own piano. therefore, sometimes I play the piano in an app. I feel happy even though it's only an application. but still I pray that one day I can buy my own piano.And what instrument do you always play?I can't play any musical instrument.  I have always had a passion for a guitar since childhood but I have yet to buy one.  But I can play a good flute with my mouth which is called whistling.  I can whistle the tune of any song.

comments.author: Violatoor
comments.body: I can't do it at all. But my grandfather played guitar, accordion and piano.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: @Raceonsucced Thank you for this thread. It made me realize that I wanted a pickle - piccolo.

comments.author: rodskee
comments.body: In Highschool , I use to play Bass Guitar but that bores me because there is no excitement anymore .then when my father find me getting board then he bring me to university to study percussion and yes , I start  loving drums and become a band leader having my Drum stick.That lasts for the next 12 years of my life until i got married and yes that change my life and stopped music as making a living because that is not enough to bring better future for my family .

comments.body: I like music, but I can't play any instrument.

comments.author: StPeterssess
comments.body: I can't, but I would like to learn acoustic guitar.
